features: Effortless Application and Long-Lasting: The creamy texture of this thrive eyeshadow stick ensures smooth and easy application, providing a shimmering effect that lasts throughout the day without sliding off

Versatile Use and Subtle Color: Ideal for daily wear, our eye shadow stick shimmer shade offers a subtle and natural look. Its versatile nature allows it to be used as a base for creating more dramatic eye looks

Waterproof and Nice Texture:This eye makeup stick is formulated with water resistant formula,the color is not easy to fade off when meet with water or sweat.The creamy texture ensures it spread well and blend easily with pretty color for a long time.The application is super smooth.Easy to apply, just color in where you want the color and blend it in,providing nice shimmer for eye,perfect for daily look

Skin-Friendly and Suitable for Sensitive Skin: This eye brightener stick is formulated with gentle formula. It glides on smoothly, providing a beautiful luster without causing irritation, making it a suitable choice for individuals with sensitive skin

Convenient and Travel-Friendly: With its crayon-like application, this eyeshadow stick eliminates the need for additional tools, making it convenient for on-the-go use. Its compact design and clever sharpener on the bottom make it a travel-friendly option, perfect for vacations or quick touch-ups

Double Ended Design Double Ended Design:This eye brightener stick is designed with double ended,one is for eye brightener,the other is built-in sharpener,convenient for usage and touch-ups at any time,save your makeup timeEasy to Apply:Directly apply the eyeshadow stick on the eyelid with your fingers or professional makeup brush,providing you charming eye loon instantly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a gorgeous shimmer color. It can be as sheer or opaque as you wish as it’s easily buildable. Since it’s a darker warm color, I found that if I do a couple of lighter layers I can wear it during the day without it looking out of place or too much. The consistency makes it easy to apply and the pointed tip is good for more precise lines. I love that it comes with a built-in sharpener at the bottom of the pen. It’s always a pain to use eye shadow sticks and not have the right kind of sharpener when you need it. Glad I picked this up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Subtle Shimmer Catches the Light
reviews.reviewText: The Thrive Eyeshadow Stick provides a subtle shimmer from microglitter, which I think is perfect for casual, everyday wear. It almost looks like no makeup, but then it catches the light and gives off a little sparkle that brightens the eyes. I chose the mauve taupe color for under my bottom lashes, and it looks nice there. I don’t like it as much in the inner corners; the champagne color would look prettier in that area. The stick is not very creamy, but it does apply easily and precisely. There is zero fallout. I like that there is a built-in sharpener, which is convenient and does not fall off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars There are better options out there
reviews.reviewText: I feel like this hardly shows up without a lot of pressure and I have fair skin. I also don't like the extremely sharp point As an eyeshadow stick I prefer it to have a more rounded surface to easily apply to the eye area. Try the E.L.F. eyeshadow sticks if you are looking for a good affordable option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Huge disappointment, won’t stick or stay.
reviews.reviewText: When I pulled this out of the box and I did a swatch on the back of my hand, it was promising, and I thought this would work out nicely. I have tried several of these kind of highlighters now, and they do not work well, so I was optimistic about this one.I am afraid that this one was a huge failure as well.As you can see from the photos I posted, you can’t even hardly tell that it’s on my face. I put this around the entire inner corner of my eye, and a little ways onto my lower lash line and from my pics you can kind of see remnants of it, but really, there was no point in putting this on at all because it was very difficult to apply, and just wouldn’t stick to my skin, and when I finally got some on it wore off within half an hour.So I’m really disappointed with this and it’s just a waste of money.I absolutely can’t recommend this.This should really be glowing around the entire inner corner of my eye, and under my eyelash and it’s like I put nothing on at all.I do hope this review is helpful and you have a wonderful day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My sensitive skin approves.
reviews.reviewText: The highlighter has impressed me so far. My skin doesn’t typically take well to new products but I haven’t had any issues yet so fingers crossed! For my skin, specifically, I’d prefer a shade lighter but that doesn’t take away from the quality of this color. It has just the right amount of shine, sheer, and brilliance. I’ve gotten compliments (I use it in the inside corners of my eyes) and it’s become part of my makeup routine. A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rose gold is a nice color, subtle but shimmery, giving a brightening effect to your eyes. I like the stick application as I tend to do better with placement than with powder, for some reason.I wouldn’t say it lasts any more or less than any other product of its kind, not spectacular, but I will add it to my rotation when I want to add a little touch of shimmer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice, But I Think We Will Stick To Regular Eyeshadow
reviews.reviewText: Nice color and consistency of this product, but it is not easy to apply, and by itself, does not give a very natural look. After applying, one needs to use a eyeshadow sponge-stick to feather it out, so we are not really sure why use this in the first place.It is creamy, but since it is in a stick, it goes on heavy to a spot and not light like eyeshadow should be applied.So much easier just to use regular eyeshadow, as this actually makes more work, not less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stays on & is easy to apply. I use it more as a brightener, just outlining the eyes rather than just eyeshadow. This color is beautiful & looks great for all day wear. I definitely will be buying this again!
